title: A course in A-C. bridge measurements
abstract: As previously announced in the Institute's JOURNAL, (October 1929, p. 781) Doctor Bernard Hague, D. Sc., Ph. D., M. I. E. E. Senior Lecturer in Electrical Engineering at the University of Glasgow, Scotland, and visiting Professor at the Brooklyn Polytechnic Institute will conduct a course of 15 lectures thereon the recent developments in the theory and practise of a-c. bridge measurements. The first lecture will be delivered the evening of Tuesday, February 11th, from 7 to 9 p. m., with one each consecutive Tuesday evening thereafter at the same hour.
